name: Space Escape (dalton-s)
description:
(Unable to find the time to host this myself, my apologies!)

A space-based avoidance game that involves phases. The game evolves into 3 phases (1st: Asteroids, 2nd: More Asteroids, 3rd: Blackholes). There is also a high-score element incorporated. 

Controls: Move the ship with the mouse. To teleport, hold the mouse down to stop moving and  then release to teleport to the location of the mouse.

Made with Javascript and Pixi.js,
